title: Agil Nabiyev
text:
Agil Nabiyev (; born 16 June 1982) is an Azerbaijani <a href="association%20football">football</a> manager and former player. He is the manager of <a href="Shuvalan%20FK">Shuvalan</a>.
Career.
Nabiyev was born in <a href="Tovuz%2C%20Azerbaijan">Tovuz</a>.
On 13 January 2013, Nabiyev signed an 18-month contract with <a href="FK%20Baku">FK Baku</a>. In August 2013 Nabiyev signed for <a href="Ravan%20Baku%20FK">Ravan Baku</a>, however in March 2014, after 13 appearances, Nabiyev left Ravan by mutual consent. Nabiyev was made a free agent when Araz-Naxçıvan folded and withdrew from the <a href="Azerbaijan%20Premier%20League">Azerbaijan Premier League</a> on 17 November 2014.
